Title: A Murder of Crowes
Plot: In the swamplands of Florida, Raylan tangles with a deadly branch of the Crowe Family Tree, while Boyd goes into the dark heart of the collapsing Detroit Mob.
GuestStars: Michael Rapaport, James Le Gros, Edi Gathegi, Sam Anderson, A.J. Buckley, Matt Craven, Dave Foley, Rick Gomez, Jason Gray-Stanford, Damon Herriman, Alicia Witt, Karolina Wydra, Ron Yuan, Jeannetta Arnette, Justin W
